properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-MAHAFINARITRA
1
O ! toera-mahafinaritra
Akaikinao, ry Ray.
Fa tony sy milamina,
Eo miadana izahay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Jesosy voatahy.
Hazony aho izao
Mba ho mpanompo sahy
Akaikin'ny fonao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O ! toera-mahafinaritra
Akaikinao, ry Ray.
Eo re no tena lanitra
Anasanao anay.
Jesosy voatahy, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O ! toera-mahafinaritra
Akaikinao, ry Ray.
Fa toera-mahasambatra
Eo ho faly izahay.
Jesosy voatahy, sns.
